org.jerkar
Class JkZipper.CheckSumer

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.JkZipper.CheckSumer
Enclosing class:
JkZipper
public static final class JkZipper.CheckSumer
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper on File allowing to creates digests on it.

Method Summary
 JkZipper.CheckSumer md5()
          Creates an MD5 digest for this wrapped file.
 JkZipper.CheckSumer md5If(boolean process)
          As md5() but allow to pass a flag as parameter to actually process or not the digesting.
static JkZipper.CheckSumer of(java.io.File file)
          Creates an instance of JkZipper.CheckSumer wrapping the specified file.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

of

public static JkZipper.CheckSumer of(java.io.File file)
Creates an instance of JkZipper.CheckSumer wrapping the specified file.

md5

public JkZipper.CheckSumer md5()
Creates an MD5 digest for this wrapped file. The digest file is written in the same directory as the digested file and has the same name + '.md5' extension.

md5If

public JkZipper.CheckSumer md5If(boolean process)
As md5() but allow to pass a flag as parameter to actually process or not the digesting.
